description: Definition for fields globally defined in the logger config

sdk.summary: Name of the Mule application. Recommendation: This value should be based on pom.xml
Version of the Mule application. Recommendation: This value should be based on pom.xml
Name of the Mule Environment where the application is running. Recommendation: This value should be based on external property
Indicate if log entries should be formatted or single line

prettyPrint.note: This field is mandatory. DON'T REMOVE

sdk.summary: Indicate if location information should be logged

logLocationInfo.note: This field is mandatory. DON'T REMOVE

sdk.summary: Indicate if Content fields should be parsed as part of the JSON logger output

parseContentFieldsInJsonOutput.note: This field is mandatory. DON'T REMOVE

sdk.summary: Indicate which fields (from JSON output) should be disabled from logging separated by comma. They should match the exact name given in loggerProcessor.json schema

disabledFields.note: This field is mandatory. DON'T REMOVE

sdk.summary: Indicate which fields (inside a content type with JSON output only) should be masked before from logging separated by comma. They can be JSON keys or JSON paths. If empty, no masking will be applied. Recommendation: This value should be based on external property

contentFieldsDataMasking.note: This field is mandatory. DON'T REMOVE
